code: export function fill(canvas,color){const ctx=canvas.getContext('2d');ctx.beginPath();ctx.fillStyle=color;ctx.fillRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);}export function drawImage(canvas,image){const imgAR=image.width/image.height;const canvasAR=canvas.width/canvas.height;const ctx=canvas.getContext('2d');if(imgAR<canvasAR){ctx.drawImage(image,(canvas.width-canvas.height*imgAR)/2,0,canvas.height*imgAR,canvas.height);}else{ctx.drawImage(image,0,(canvas.height-canvas.width/imgAR)/2,canvas.width,canvas.width/imgAR);}}export function drawAndFill(canvas,image,color){if(color){fill(canvas,color);}drawImage(canvas,image);};
